message: Let's start with a fair split. I'll give you 400k. Your turn!
I think a 60/40 split is fairer, considering the value of money will decrease for me with each passing round.
That's not a new offer, Bob. I'll make a new one. How about 550k for me and 450k for you?
I'm willing to give you a bit more, but I'm not going to give up too much. Your turn!
